name: Sus' Cat Scratch Attack Casserole
author: FabulousChef
summary: This is a favorite among my family, and we always give the leftovers to our cat, Sus, because she just loves it!
ingredients: 1 (10 ounce) can cream of mushroom soup
2 (3 ounce) cans tuna in water, drained
1 large fresh jalapeno pepper, seeded and minced
salt and ground black pepper to taste
directions: Place the rice and water in a saucepan
Bring to a boil and cook until the rice is tender and water has been absorbed, about 20 minutes
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Mix together the cooked rice, mushroom soup, mayonnaise, tuna, hot sauce, jalapeno pepper, salt, and black pepper in a bowl; pour into a 9 inch casserole dish
Bake in preheated oven until heated through, about 30 minutes
